column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We've been here maybe four times now? The husband has always been extremely fond of noodle and soup dishes (satisfying his cravings with the plentiful pho round these parts)
column2: so JINYA is a no brainier.  My initial hesitance was assuaged by the servers revelation that the thick noodles are in fact egg-free (traditional thin ramen noodles typically contain egg). Hell
column3: with the current egg shortage creeping around
column4: be assured that the thick noodles are quite delicious and capable of satiated your ramen noodle-y hankerings.  I will say I did receive thin noodles once
column6: but the error was corrected as quickly as it could be and
